alert.note: Alert for Manua; Rose Atoll; Swains Island; Tutuila and Aunuu (American Samoa) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS American Samoa (Pago Pago, American Samoa)
info.headline: Wind Advisory issued December 16 at 12:28AM SST by NWS American Samoa
info.description: ...A Wind Advisory is now in effect through 6 am this morning... * Nearby thunderstorms embedded within a deep convections just west-southwest will continue to produce gusty winds, especially during heavy downpours... * TIMING...through 6 am Saturday morning * IMPACTS...Expect possible downed tree limbs as well as shifting of loose and unsecured small objects due to strong winds. Gusty winds will make driving difficult and may cause hazardous conditions for mariners. FAUTUAGA MO SAVILI MALOLOSI OFISA O LE TAU PAGO PAGO AS 1227 VAVEAO ASO TOANA`I TESEMA 16 2023 ...Ua iai nei le FAUTUAGA MO SAVILI MALOLOSI e oo i le 6 i le taeao nei... * O faititili o lo`o lata mai i le atunu`u i sisifo ma saute i sisifo ua mafua ai ona agi fa`ata`uta`u savili, ae maise lava taimi e mamafa ai timuga... * TAIMI...seia oo i le 6 i le taeao nei * AAFIAGA...E pau`u ai laau, lelea mea totino e le`i faamaumauina ma faaleagaina ai apa ma taualuga o fale. Savili malolosi e mafai ona faafaigata ai ona faafoe taavale, ae maise lava taavale maualuluga. E sousou fo`i le sami ona o le malolosi o savili. FAUTUAGA/TAPENAGA... O le uiga o le fautuaga mo savili malolosi o savili e 30 i le 35 mph ma malolosi atu i taimi e agi faata`uta`u ai ua taunuu mai i luga o le atunu`u. O nei savili e malolosi atu i nofoaga maualuluga. O le a faafaigata ai fo`i ona faafoe taavale i luga o le auala tele, ae maise taavale tetele ma le maualuluga. Ia faautagia mai lenei fautuaga.
info.instruction: A wind advisory means that winds of 30 to 35 MPH with higher gusts are expected. Winds this strong can make driving difficult, especially for high profile vehicles. Use extra caution.

area.areaDesc: Manua; Rose Atoll; Swains Island; Tutuila and Aunuu
